module.name: VoIPInnovations
module.description: This module is used to configure, manage and troubleshoot your VoIPInnovations(tm) SIP trunks and DIDs. The license on this source code is NOT GPL Open Source, it is a proprietary Free to Use license.
module.changelog: *15.0.34* Packaging of ver 15.0.34 *15.0.33* Packaging of ver 15.0.33 *15.0.32* FREEI-5666 *15.0.31* FREEI-5405 *15.0.30* Packaging of ver 15.0.30 *15.0.29* Packaging of ver 15.0.29 *15.0.28* FREEI-5323 Renaming VI to Metered SIP Trunking *15.0.27* FREEI-5272 Fixed the reload issue *15.0.26* Packaging of ver 15.0.26 *15.0.25* Packaging of ver 15.0.25 *15.0.24* Packaging of ver 15.0.24 *15.0.23* FREEI-4970 Mysql getting crashed when I recive the SMS in the description through VI trunk. *15.0.22* FREEI-4944 *15.0.21* FREEI-4363 VI SMS not working properly *15.0.20* FREEI-4304 Remove all voice feature blocks for VI module *15.0.19* FREEI-4243 Linking SMS DID in User Manager for VoIP Innovation trunk does not save *15.0.18* Packaging of ver 15.0.18 *15.0.17* FREEI-3990 Change way VI trunks are created *15.0.16* FREEI-3972 VI DID verification dialplan breaks without +1 DID *15.0.15* FREEI-3910 VI MMS issue *15.0.14* FREEI-3856 Firewall entries for VI module are overly permissive *15.0.13* FREEI-3856 Firewall entries for VI module are overly permissive *15.0.12* FREEI-3812 Voip Innovation SMS is not working *15.0.11* FREEI-3806 An extra + symbol is added to the DID number in VI inbound route *15.0.10* FREEI-3785 Change proxy IP address for VI trunk *15.0.9* FREEI-3784 VI module disabled when sip driver set to PJSIP only *15.0.8* FREEI-3619 Change VI module text showing when not in use *15.0.7* FREEI-3391 Fixed inbound route issue *15.0.6* Packaging of ver 15.0.6 *15.0.5* FREEI-3391 Need licensing unlock for VI module *15.0.4* Adding MMS support *15.0.3* FREEI-3391 Need licensing unlock for VI module *15.0.2* FREEI-3119: Fix whoops errors caused by using deprecated core routing functions *15.0.1* Packaging of ver 15.0.1 *15.0.0* Initial release
